Sentencas: Natural hematite ore is used as a novel photocatalyst for visible photocatalyst and also for advanced fuel cell applications.
Titulo: Natural hematite ore composited with ZnO nanoneedles for energy applications

Sentencas: The hematite was composited with needle-shaped ZnO via a hydrothermal approach.
Titulo: Natural hematite ore composited with ZnO nanoneedles for energy applications

Sentencas: This hematite-based system exhibits excellent photodegradation for methelyene blue within 40 min when the hematite is hybridized with wurzite-structured ZnO under visible light irradiation.
Titulo: Natural hematite ore composited with ZnO nanoneedles for energy applications

Sentencas: The hybrid heterojunction was characterized by the transmission electron microscopy, ultraviolet-visible diffuses reflectance spectra, cyclic voltammetry, and AC impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Natural hematite ore composited with ZnO nanoneedles for energy applications

Sentencas: The photocatalytic activity of the heterojunction was evaluated by the photodegradation of MB dye.
Titulo: Natural hematite ore composited with ZnO nanoneedles for energy applications

Sentencas: The high photocatalytic activity observed under visible light is discussed on basis of the coupling of the hybrid heterojunction band structure.
Titulo: Natural hematite ore composited with ZnO nanoneedles for energy applications

Sentencas: On the other hand, hematite ore and its composites were also used for advanced fuel cells.
Titulo: Natural hematite ore composited with ZnO nanoneedles for energy applications

Sentencas: At 550 degrees C, 182 mW cm(-2) and 580 mW cm(-2) were achieved for fuel cells using raw hematite and composite with ZnO as the electrolytes, respectively.
Titulo: Natural hematite ore composited with ZnO nanoneedles for energy applications

Sentencas: The heterostructure energy band alignment is proposed.
Titulo: Natural hematite ore composited with ZnO nanoneedles for energy applications

Sentencas: These results demonstrate that the natural composites for next-generation functional semiconductor-ionic materials can influence the multi-utilization of natural resources, thereby affecting the environment and energy sustainability.
Titulo: Natural hematite ore composited with ZnO nanoneedles for energy applications
